entity.name: Updates on the Covid-19 situation in the Philippines
entity.description: This page provides real-time updates on the Covid-19 situation from trusted and official sources.

text:
@piaranada Xi told Duterte that PH will be a priority when China develops a coronavirus vaccine.

“President Xi...assured PRRD his country’s commitment to make the vaccine available for all, adding that the Philippines, as a friendly neighbor, would certainly be a priority,” says Roque.
